overview: Bayu's life is comfortable, apart from Yowis Ben's growing popularity, Asih, his girlfriend, also always supports Bayu in his every dream. Bayu begins to feel anxious about his future when Nando, his keyboard player, decides to study music abroad, Cak Jon decides to leave Yowis Ben and pursue his love, Mbak Rini, who is engaged to an officer, Captain Arjuna. The situation is made worse by the arrival of Susan, Bayu's ex, who makes them close again without Asih's knowledge. Will Bayu succeed in defending Yowis Ben and maintaining Asih's love, when Bayu is secretly close to Susan again?
title: Yowis Ben 3
